sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].DataLakeDestinationContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].DataLakeDestinationFolder,'/DELTA/',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceSchemaName,'/',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName,'_',variables('varExtractDataEndDate'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
null as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].DataLakeDestinationContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].DataLakeDestinationFolder,'/DELTA/',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceSchemaName,'/',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',activity('GetSQLTableList').output.value[0].SourceTableName,'_',variables('varExtractDataEndDate'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
null as RowsCopied,
null as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
'@{replace(activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDeltaSQL').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorMessage

activities.name: GetSQLTableList
activities.description: getting the list of Sql tables from control table stored in Azure SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select cts.*, lsc.*, utc.UnityCatalogName, utc.StorageAccountName,convert(varchar,isnull(DeltaLastWatermarkDateTime,'1900-01-01'),120) as FormattedLastWatermarkDateTime 
from etl.ControlTableSourceToAdlsLoad cts 
inner join etl.LinkedServiceConnectionStore lsc on cts.SourceDatabaseName = lsc.DatabaseName
inner join etl.UnityCatalogConnectionStore utc on cts.IsActiveFlag = utc.IsActiveFlag
where 
lsc.SourceServerName = '@{pipeline().parameters.pSourceServerName}'
and cts.SourceDatabaseName = '@{pipeline().parameters.pSourceDatabaseName}'
and cts.SourceSchemaName = '@{pipeline().parameters.pSourceSchemaName}'
and cts.SourceTableName = '@{pipeline().parameters.pSourceTableName}'
and cts.SourceType = 'SQLServer'
